website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and rugged, this car-size mat sits directly under your vehicle to act a shield against leaks, spills, or tracked-in grime.
pros: This mat’s thick and heavy fabric all but guarantees containment against heavy spills and leaks
It features raised edges to reduce spillovers, and the bottom is lightly textured to keep it in place
All seams are on the underside for improved durability
Includes squeegee head for straightforward cleaning
cons: Mat doesn’t always sit flush to the floor and creases are difficult to eliminate
Surface of the mat is not absorbent and can get slippery

customer_reviews.title: I have a flat garage floor and the water from ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a flat garage floor and the water from the melted snow on the cars would puddle against the wall. Since I got these mats, I have had no water on the floor. They seem to be made of high quality material. I have not been able to get the wrinkles out of them. I think because they are cold. But the wrinkles don't seem to affect their ability to keep the water of the floor. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting everything in your garage from mud, snow & rain!
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well that we bought a second one! We live in the mountains in Colorado and have many months of parking cars in our garage with snow and mud on the tires and car. Does an amazing job trapping the moisture so that our garage doesn't get trashed!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ramer

customer_reviews.title: A solid option for containing slush in the winter
customer_reviews.text: This mat seems to be of high quality and absolutely does the job of containing winter slush. I have a few quibbles which are: 1) It can get very slippery when wet -- I'd like to see a future version of this with some texture applied. 2) Because of the raised foam edges it doesn't lay completely flat and smooth. 3) The raised foam edges it make it tougher to squeegee off. I've had to drag it partially out of the garage and fold under one end to clear it off..
customer_reviews.author: J. Sharley

customer_reviews.title: Work great, but creases and wrinkles from shipping can't be removed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 mats for my pickup trucks, both 9x22. They are sturdy and well constructed. My only issue so far is the mats are so tightly rolled up for shipping, the material takes a set and they do not lie flat. All attempts to flatten them to remove wrinkles and large fold creases have been unsuccessful. So I park over them as is. They are very effective at managing water/snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice purchase if you are hoping to protect your garage floor
customer_reviews.text: At first I gave his a crappy review because out of the box it looked like just a crappy piece of thick plastic. However, once it warmed up, it flattens out nicely. I take it out of the garage and house it off to clean, and it's good to go. One minor problem is snow build up when you are driving in the winter. If you live in a cold climate with snow, you'll have water on the mat once it melts. If your garage gets well below freezing at night, you might want to pass on this item. The snow will melt in during the day, and freeze at night.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Emery

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: In central NY the snow and sand on the roads gets heavy, this item works amazingly to contain the runoff on the mat and not all over the garage floor - easy to clean up with the included squeegee head - I think it will also be easier to store over the summer as it easily rolls up - I have a Mazda CX5 - a one stall garage and the 16' L fits very well and catches everything. The fabric seems very durable though the mat is not so heavy or clumsy that I can easily move it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: marena k

customer_reviews.title: No more dirty snow.
customer_reviews.text: Get this product! It works as advertised and contains all the dirty melting snow that drips off your car onto the garage floor. When the car is off it I pull the edge just outside the garage and use the squeegee to sweep all the mess onto the sloped driveway. Do unpack it and give it about a day in the house to relax. Getting a second one next winter for my second car.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lyons

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. We've had lots of snow this year, and it's contained the mess and kept my garage clean. It's really nice that they include a squeegee. I've had the same experience as others with the mat not flattening out, but it hasn't been a problem. In a way, it makes it easier to squeegee the water out, as it kind of creates channels for the water. You do need to squeegee the water off frequently if you get a lot of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Losendos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. As a polymer (plastic) chemist with 50 ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. As a polymer (plastic) chemist with 50 years of experience, I can confirm that this mat is made of quality material . The mat very flexible and lays down flat immediately. I tend to avoid things made of plastic because manufacturers use plastics where they are not suited because of their inherent properties. I believe in this case that is not true. If my future experience finds this product lacking I definitely will let you know. Regards, Ed
customer_reviews.author: Edward Vanzo

customer_reviews.title: Yup.  It curls up.
customer_reviews.text: As nearly everyone has commented, the product curls up. Mine laid almost flat when I first got it, so I figured I was an exception to the rule. Unfortunately, over time the mat has curled up along all sides. It is a tripping hazard for sure, but also may not work as intended. I have only had one snow since installed, so not a good test of that so far. But rainfall has not necessarily kept the water inside the containment. If it would only lie flat!!
customer_reviews.author: mark r lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item just before the winter set in and it is working as advertised. It definitely holds a lot of water and snow, kept me from having to mop out my garage every day. Now all I do is drag the mats out onto my driveway and hose them off and dry them out and reset them in the garage. The downside do not try to correct your steering while on the mat this will cause it to bunch up. Overall I am happy with this purchase a would recommend it all who live in wet areas.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice solution to melted snow in the garage.
customer_reviews.text: The mat held a lot of water from the melted snow this last winter. It was nice to be able to just drag the mat out of the garage to clean it. It also was nice to have the water from the melted snow contained and not all over the garage floor. The mat worked just as we hoped it would. So far there have been no signs of wear on the mat. I would and have recommended this mat to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alynn Brodine

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. Upstate NY 60 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Upstate NY 60 year old garage floor that currently slopes to the stairs leading in the kitchen. I was running out of ideas to keep my feet dry and prevent less wear on the concrete. Placed this down let the snow fall off and wet vaccum up what stays in the mat. Only beef is it does not lay completely flat despite unpacking it and leaving it in heated basement for 3 days unrolled... Maybe by next year though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mat saved me so much time, trouble, aggravation and water damage!
customer_reviews.text: This mat saved me so much time and trouble last winter! We live in west Denver. Our garage floor tilts toward the house and I was always fighting melting snow running up against the house and getting stored things wet. It was a race between me and the snow melt to try to get it out before it ruined things. Then I ordered this mat and everything changed! It contained the snow melt perfectly. While I was at work my husband would sometimes go out and squeegee the water out to the back of the garage. I can't say enough good things about this mat! What a find! I just wish I'd found it 3 years earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Bishops

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, but seller was great to work with
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased with this mat for my purposes as a "toy garage" mat; however, I can see where it would work for someone who isn't as particular about sweeping it frequently and is just driving a car on and off. The seller worked with me to resolve the issue, which made it a positive purchase experience.
customer_reviews.author: Aligon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great. VERY happy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I had no wrinkle issues like some reviewers. (I rolled out and left in direct sunlight before I placed in garage.) I have this on top of their Grey Small Coin garage mat. I get lots of comments (and questions about where to purchase) on both. VERY satisfied customer. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Won't lay flat, hard to clean off
customer_reviews.text: I guess it works to contain snow melt from running all over my garage, but the thing won't lay flat and has all sorts of creases and humps from being folded up in the box. This makes it a real PITA to clean off. 3 stars is the best I can give it ... it works, but it ain't pretty. Too soon to tell about durability ... our snow tires track in a lot of gravel, so will see how the material holds up over time. Will be using it only during snowy months, and will roll up and store during the summer/fall.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Landberry

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great. From Minnesota.
customer_reviews.text: I’m halfway through my first winter with this mat. Overall, it has helped me keep the garage floor cleaner. It needs to be bigger. We drive a Prius and it barely catches snow and ice coming off the car, especially on the sides. It doesn’t adhere to floor very well. When I pull into the garage it tends to gather up under the wheels. I did not tape it down as they suggested. I think that’s poor design. I don’t want tape residue on the floor. Overall, not a bad product, but not as good as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Dufault

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty vinyl product which is well constructed. I have easily cleaned up antifreeze and oil from the mat. The rolled edges of the mat are very well made. They did not permanently crush even when I parked a heavy vehicle directly on an edge for about a week. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Legare

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and i bought another because this thing actually works. Traps all the slush and water . I threw my other one away because the edges did not hold up. Would give this 10 stars if possible. Worth the little extra money for just the best on market.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Looking to keep the water contained after rain or snow. so far thus is doing the job. They do slip around and we have to be careful not to trip over the baffle edge when we are walking around the car. Haven't used the squeegee but did mop up some water and dried perfectly. Hopefully will last. Once the warmer weather gets here, should flatten out a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Aquateachmjl

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size. I bought 2 for my garage. They are just the right length. The only problem is that the ends curled up. I taped them down I had put very heavy objects on them but it did nit help. We rolled the ends under and then had a hump in about 3 inches with the edges still sticking up. We out them out in sun as suggested by a reviewer. No help. They are easy to clean and can be vacuumed.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi14

customer_reviews.title: This mat does wonders for keeping my garage usable during the winter.
customer_reviews.text: This car mat was delivered in the winter. It has a lot of creases in it since I haven’t yet had a warm sunny day to put the mat out flat to soften the creases. This is a real nice containment mat and has kept water from running under a partition wall in my garage. Very happy with this mat. It is expensive and I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank3

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the last 12 month in my garage in Colorado and it is working well with my Toyota Highlander. Keeps the snow melt and dirt in place. I do have to frequently clean it with a shop vac but that was expected to remove water and dirt. The matt does slide and needs to readjusted from time to time but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wegerich

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations & then some.
customer_reviews.text: It is too new for me to know how durable it is; it appears to be durable enough for having a vehicle park on it. There are 4 adhesive packs to attach to each corner. There is a nice rimmed edge that will hold in rain etc. I live in the desert so don't care about snow and mud. Just want to keep my garage floor clean. I plan to order another to put under my other car.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce P

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: My garage does not have a drain in the floor and subsequently all of the water and melted snow would run to the back corner of the garage. Previous owners of the home allowed the water to saturate the foundation over the years which caused the house to settle and crack an exterior brick wall. Use of this containment mat would have prevented the damage. Excellent product. The only thing I would have done to make it better would be to widen it by about a foot to make it easier to line up my truck on it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, then bought a different brand, and then went back to this brand. The other brand wrinkle when you drive on it, while this one seems to be more flexible and will not bunch up when you turn your wheels. Only issue is that they often are out of stock and take a long time to get.
customer_reviews.author: alias

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bar / garage at my house and the floor is sealed. I didn't want all the slush and melting snow on my floor, so I refused to park my newer truck in the garage. Until my wife bought me this mat. It works get and catches most of the slop. I only had this for about a week but so far I am pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill N.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good....
customer_reviews.text: PROS- material strong, doesn't smell, left in the house for several days for it to get warm, wrinkles yes no big deal, can vacuum up the water no problem. The foam seems to be holding up. Ordered the largest for a GMC YUKON and had plenty of room. CONS- yes its slippery if you step in the water so be careful! Let you know the end of season...
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Protects the garage floor
customer_reviews.text: I have mats down in my garage. I put this on top of the nice mats to catch all the junk from the bottom of the car...in rain and snow. It keeps my mats clean. I have to readjust it from time to time as I drive over it everyday...but so what. For me...it does the job and I am more than happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ffnf63

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado where we get snow one day and it's 80 degrees the next. I did a lot of research and this was a winner. It has contained dripping snow/mud and rain from getting across the garage to a corner where some idiot hung the drywall to close to the garage floor. I see it lasting about 4-6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman5150

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Mat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: In OH, we have not had a bad winter yet this season. I purchased this mat to keep water from ruining things stored in my garage. So far we have had one measurable snow and this mat has well served its purpose. It is easy to squeegee (provided) and I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vjs

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but better than the bare floor.
customer_reviews.text: As Montanans, melted dirty snow on the garage floor is a frequent, messy reality. We bought 1 to try and liked it enough to get another. We like how well they contain water. They are reasonably sturdy and so far are holding up even with the studded tires. We use the water attachment on the shop vac to remove the melted snow. The downsides... I wish they were made of a thicker plastic and the the rolled edges are a tripping hazard when moving around, in & out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: sings4joy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps garage dry
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this brand and have not been disappointed. After first snow held 5-6 gallons of water. I use a little shop vac to remove water. Did use double sided tape to secure to cement so it doesn’t slide.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - nice heavy weight for driving on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product - nice heavy weight for driving on and off of with my SUV. We have mopped it and used our wet/dry vac and both methods worked fine. Holds a lot of melted snow and ice - we don't have to mop it every single time and it keeps the runoff from going everywhere in our garage. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Julia G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the snow and ice was on the mat and well contained - made life easier
customer_reviews.author: D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item due to having a new garage floor poured. My Chevy Equinox fits perfect on the mat. Looking forward to having no dirt and grime on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Brianstl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Look
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had these long but hoping they hold up. They make the garage look nice. Our autos fit good on them. Easy to lay out or move.
customer_reviews.author: Just Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Get these if you want to protect your garage
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new home with our first garage. Unfortunately over the winter we were dragging in a lot of salt and sand. We were concerned that this may be harmful to our concrete and researched what options were available.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Car Mat
customer_reviews.text: We're using this under an SUV that brings home a lot of road dirt in the winter. The garage is a gorilla floor so very slippery in the winter. Any water, snow, salt stays on the mat. It is easy to sweep the water and dirt off the mat when necessary. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne K. George

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I wish this mat were heavier. It does not stay put on my garage floor. When I drive into the garage, the mat scoots forward. When I back out, it scoots backwards. It wrinkles easily. I am constantly needing to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Saved the wood floors in our garage.
customer_reviews.text: Our garage is an 1890's carriage house with wood floors. We installed these mats a year ago and have been very happy with them. They are sturdy and durable, and capture all the drips and snow. Easy to clean too - I just drag them outside and clean with a broom or hose.
customer_reviews.author: Rich E

customer_reviews.title: Lays flat when unrolled in the summer !  Thinking of some Mods .
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked my two mats today. Weighted down the corners with a little stretch ...on a warm 80 deg day ! And they layed very flat. Ordered the mid size and largest ... perfect combo with plenty of coverage all around a Sequoia SUV and. Camry . Actually they are a little long. Thinking of cutting the back ends off and the garage slope should let water run off and out of the garage. I will probably use self adhesive Velcro under the corners ...borders to keep them put. I think I will like these much better the the mats I have used before without containment edges... and grey looks much better than black when dirty !
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH

customer_reviews.title: Works OK under the car
customer_reviews.text: It does the job containing the snow melt off the car My problem is, I can't get it to lie flat on the floor. This makes it harder to clean Bought a different brand for my other car and it lies flat.
customer_reviews.author: Rubble

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have done for my garage. They work as advertised probably better. Every time I look at them in the garage I wish I had done it 15 years ago . As I was cleaning them with my shop vac I was actually smiling. I can hardly wait until spring when I WON’T have to clean up salt and all the other mess from the garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Rody

customer_reviews.title: These Mats are great, but measure your garage width ( we didn't 😞)
customer_reviews.text: These are great for garages, our daughter bought one and then we had to have one. Keeps all the dirty melting snow on the mat! Make sure to measure your garage, as we should have bought one size bigger but that was our fault!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just have to unroll it and put some weights on ...
customer_reviews.text: Just have to unroll it and put some weights on the corners to help get the creases out. Contains water and mud well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mat is just what I needed. I drive a mud filled or snow filled road. The crud and melted snow is no longer filling my garage floor. Now it's contained on this mat. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Keith

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing...should have ordered two! My garage has never been cleaner and even smells better now that I can remove the excess mud and snow out so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: It's great! I got the longest one for my F150 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I got the longest one for my F150 and it does the job! Money well spent for snowy winters!
customer_reviews.author: Josh or Candace

customer_reviews.title: It’s very effective to keep the wet runoff contained!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mat! My recently painted garage floor loves this mat! Now that winter has set in, the mat keeps the floor dry. No more wet run-off all over the rest of the garage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Simple ideas are always the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a mat that you put in your garage to contain melting snow or dripping rain. It comes with a squeegie so you can just push it all out onto your driveway. It has protected many things I have stored in my garage. I highly recommend this if you have limited storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Works, order larger than you need
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wifes rav 4. It keeps all the snow melting off the car in one place, easy to suck the water out with a shop vac. Largest complaint is it does stay where you place it. The mat moves around slowly as you park on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Harrington

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I liked about the mat is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I liked about the mat is that it kept all the snow and rain contained and off the garage floor. The least thing I liked is that you had to be careful walking around it especially when it it was full of water or when it froze in the cold weather. Obviously you had to mop it up to keep it somewhat dry but it has served its purpose and am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: awesome product -- I am storing heavy farm equipment on these; I also purchased 1/4" thick vinyl runners as I am driving on these with chains.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S. Kahan

customer_reviews.title: Won't lay flat.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality if it didn't wrinkle up making it hard to squeegee. Because it tries ti fold itself back to the way it came, it folds lengthwise too. That makes it narrower. I wish i had gotten it in the summer so i could leave it out in the sun for awhile to flatten out. The ribbed edges seem to make the situation worse. They are need to contain water but doesn't allow the middle to lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: michael b. phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fine mats
customer_reviews.text: The mats are high quality and contain large amounts of water. They were easy to install, but the only instructions were printed in very small type of the box. An instruction sheet in the box would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Clean with shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Works well in WI winters but be prepared to clean it often or water will spill over edges when you drive over them. I suggest using a shop vac to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Zurawski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my garage and the fit and usefulness was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Has not moved since installed. Other floor protectors bind and wrinkle. This makes it hard to squeegee and sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Porky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mat purchase. Great for slush from Michigan winters. I will have one for each vehicle/at one day!
customer_reviews.author: C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Protects floor well
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but the wrinkles in it are difficult to eliminate. Keeps floor dry and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Fess

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this if you have winter slop on your cars. This has saved hours of cleaning our garage. It contains any mess from spreading across the floor and getting to any thing else! LOVE it! Stays in place! If i ever change vehicles, i will get another one to fit!!
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Second one we have purchased. Takes about 3-4 weeks for them to lay flat. No more messes on the garage Floor A++
customer_reviews.author: Gwh46703

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from uneven garage floor
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Keeps the water from pooling in the back of our unlevel garage. Must have for Upstate NY for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: My landscaping guys are using this under mowers when they clean and change oil. Nice size for that. Fits 2 commercial mowers with extra room to work.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our heated finished garage without a convenient drain. Using it for our UTV with plow to catch a lot of melting snow. Use a wet/dry vac to remove excess water. So happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable coverage but thin
customer_reviews.text: It covered the floor in the garage... but thought the material was a little thinner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: laff

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, very durable. I don't have it secured to the floor, but it stays in place anyway. Huge!
customer_reviews.author: Ghaawks70

customer_reviews.title: Makes the garage look good
customer_reviews.text: I laid this mat down after power washing and repainting the garage floor. The floor was a mess. And though it is not winter when the mat will really be put to the test, it is amazing to see how much dirt is on the mat after only a couple of weeks -- no wonder the floor always looked so badly. Now I can just sweep the mat and/or wash off the mat and everything looks clean.
customer_reviews.author: rembrandt

customer_reviews.title: Not that durable.
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a touch over a month, I noticed a leak on the garage floor and the underside of the mat is wet. I’ve been very meticulous in sweeping the mat off and keeping it clean from road debris. Pretty disappointed that it’s durabi is this poor.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Contains mud snow and water
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fine. Is durable but time will tell. I wish there was a size between the large truck and next size. Length is ok for my F 150 but another 6” in width would be great. My garage wasn’t big enough for the large size. I am pleased with how it works
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: so nice to have a clean garage during the winter
customer_reviews.text: so nice to have a clean garage during the winter, easy to fold up for the summer. I may keep it down all year round for those rainy days. I used some double sticky tape to keep it in place on the corners., though I/m not sure it is really necessary. Wish I would have had it a couple years ago!!! A great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Reay

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep entrance to house clean
customer_reviews.text: This is our first winter and there hasn’t been much snow yet but the mat so far is doing what I needed:. Keeping dirt and liquid off our attached garage floor. The mat does shift a bit from driving over it and turning the wheel a bit. But it is light weight and easy to return to the original position when needed.
customer_reviews.author: ccfj

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles after installing
customer_reviews.text: Installing is easy, the time element is involver while trying to remove the wrinkles. Yet to park the car. Dimensions matches the expectations. Reducing a star due to wrinkle factor.
customer_reviews.author: Sreevathsan Ravichandran

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. The material is plenty thick and it does a much better job keeping water off the floor of my garage than a competitor's mat that ripped after about 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Hold large amount of water.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased during winter and very challenging to get it to lay flat without any wrinkles due to colder temperature. Even with the wrinkles , it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Garage floor protector
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for approximately 2 weeks. It does fit my Toyota RAV 4. It has stayed in place. So far so good. No rips or holes.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It's waterproof and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.text: Because its in an unheated garage in Maine , the water that lands on it from the car turns to ice overnight and that can become VERY slippery in the morning. But that said, I really like this mat better than anything I've tried in years.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Savage

customer_reviews.title: Does keep rain from spreading through the garage
customer_reviews.text: easy to lay down, easy to keep clean. keeps rain water dripping off my car from spreading through the garage. Haven't had snow yet but expect good results
customer_reviews.author: chopp

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Does move a little after a few days and need to reposition.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1000

customer_reviews.title: Dry garage
customer_reviews.text: The garage has remained clean and dry this winter. The mat was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Works but needs heat to lay flat. Has wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: It works good. My grandmothers escape fit on it well. Only complaint is the material doesn’t like to flatten out all the way. We have placed weights at the four corners to kinda stretch it out. Will see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Daddio

customer_reviews.title: Keeps garage dry.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to layout. I took out of box and layed out in warm place first. No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Csolbie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made for the garage in a long time. Keeps the floor free of rain and snow melt. In the fall, keep all the leaves from staining the floor on the wet days.
customer_reviews.author: Don Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third mat I've purchased (for 3 cars). I highly recommend, love these things!
customer_reviews.author: Ginnys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compared many items like this. Great value and an excellent product- thanks!
customer_reviews.author: @rchitect @lex

customer_reviews.title: Really does a great job of keeping the snow melt and road salt ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved me during the heavy northeast Nebraska snows. Really does a great job of keeping the snow melt and road salt off the garage floor. Is a pain to dump but if you use a partner its not too bad. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for my garage floor
customer_reviews.text: This large mat provides high-quality protection from mud and melted snow and ice, keeping the garage floor clean and dry. It's easy to clean with the shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Noel

customer_reviews.title: It is working very well!  Looks great and contains all the run-off from snow and ice!
customer_reviews.text: It is working very well! Looks great and contains all the run-off from snow and ice!
customer_reviews.author: J. Albers

customer_reviews.title: no more wet garage floor
customer_reviews.text: It is great in the winter for collecting all the excess snow from my car.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wiersema

customer_reviews.title: It's doing what it was made to do !!!
customer_reviews.text: I still gave it a 5 star even though I have to shop vac the water off of it. No leaks and the edging keeps it form even after driving over it a thousand times.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Janowicz

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the mat. The only issue is that it has not relaxed to get the folds out of the tarp for a smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Schackel

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs very well!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because I live in western NY with constant snow in winter but so far it absorbs it all! Easy to install. Tape keeps it from rolling up on edges. I’m very happy with the product and am looking for a smaller one for the snow blower!
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Keeps water, snow and dirt on the mat. Easy to clean. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Dupe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service, truly care about making the customer happy. I would buy again with confidence. The mats are designed to accomplish exactly what I needed them to do.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty wrinkled up when you unroll them
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty wrinkled up when you unroll them. Warm garage helps and keep walking around on top of the plastic when laid out,, with socks on and keep stretching it out. It helps.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: don't unroll or set up when it is cool out. better putting down when warm
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. Note...don't unroll or set up when it is cool out. better putting down when warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to assemble. Just roll it out. Holds water and mud well.
customer_reviews.author: bonedocrob

customer_reviews.title: Read product details before you buy anything.
customer_reviews.text: I keep tripping over it. I returned one for refund. If I didn’t open the second one and lay it on the floor, I would’ve returned that one as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Cavalchire

product_meta.title: TruContain Containment Mat for Snow Ice Water and Mud -Garage Floor Mat (7'9"x16')
product_meta.description: Size:7'9"x16'Heavier. Stronger. Better looking. Smart design. The trucontain garage floor containment mat is the ultimate in containment mat experiences. Having sold the 'leading brand' for years, we listened and launched the perfect containment mat. All seams are located under the mat, with a lightly textured surface to make to product easy to clean. 1.18" foam with heat welded 23oz pvc infused fabric creates a flexible yet strong containment edge with a total height near 1.25 inches. Attractive gray color with 30 day money back guarantee, 1 year limited warranty and even a discounted exchange program for out of warranty repairs.
feature_bullets: Installs in minutes, No assembly required
Free (USA ONLY) fast shipping free squeegee head included
